dict.acceptation: 自然（界）的；身体的；物质的；自然规律的；

sent.orig: It's really not tough and physical because the NBA isn't a physical game anymore.
sent.trans: 现在是一项不同的比赛，因为现在的nba已经不是physical的竞技了。

sent.orig: From the physical constraints, I was in physical education on home, ease.
sent.trans: 摆脱了体能的约束，我居然在体育课上混得如鱼得水，轻松自在。

sent.orig: It needs constant refreshing of physical attributes for the body only exists in the physical world.
sent.trans: 它需要经常更新物质的属性只是为了让物质身体存在于这世界。

sent.orig: Six physical education institutes were founded to turn out physical education personnel.
sent.trans: 创办了六所体育学院，培养体育专门人才。

sent.orig: The physical education teaching attitude and physical education teaching efficiency of elementary teacher show middle degree.
sent.trans: 国小教师体育教学态度与体育教学效能皆呈中上程度，尚称良好。
